title: Short-Intensive Course for Strengthening Science Competencies Using EdTech-Based Social Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Environment where professionals collaboratively learn science knowledge applicable to their work via social learning platforms

learning_goals: Learners can complete science problem-solving processes at over 80% completion rates through peer evaluation and feedback on the Edmodo-based platform.
Learners can engage in real-time knowledge sharing with peers three or more times per week using mobile microlearning content.
Learners can achieve 3 out of 4 points or higher in formative assessments of ICT-enabled science learning competencies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
